info.name: WhatsApp API v2
info.description: WhatsApp Web Automation API with randomized delays and breaks

request.description: Check if browser is open and WhatsApp is logged in
Initialize Chrome browser and navigate to WhatsApp Web
Initialize Firefox browser and navigate to WhatsApp Web
Close the browser and end the session
Send a text message to a single contact
Send a message with an image attachment
Send a message with a document attachment
Send bulk messages with default settings. Uses placeholders: {{name}}, {{firstName}}, {{phone}}
Send bulk messages with custom delay and break settings. Break occurs after random 3-7 messages, duration is random 1-3 minutes.

item.name: Bulk Operations (Background)
item.description: Background bulk operations with pause/resume/stop control

request.description: Start a bulk send operation in the background. Returns immediately with operation ID. Use status/pause/resume/stop endpoints to control.
Get current bulk operation status including progress, sent/failed counts, and operation state.
Pause the currently running bulk operation. Use /resume to continue.
Stop the current bulk operation completely. Cannot be resumed after stopping.
